tag_list: physician, appointment, doctor, times, doctors, directory, dentists, find, doctor-appointments
overview: Medezon has launched an online medical market place for patients and healthcare providers www.medezon.com. Medezon caters to the large under insured and price sensitive patient population in California. The online market place allows patients to search for providers, with the ability to choose the most convenient medical services at a price of their choice.
